text:
July 17, 1968
Mr. Phillip Horton
Center for New York City Affair*
70 5th Avenue
New York City, New York
Bear Mr, Hortons
Ba* week a package of material about programming
for the disadvantaged, which had been prepared by this
office, was rent to you at the request of Dr. Richard Meyer.
We would be pleased to discuss any of these matter* with
you further at your pleasure.
Sincerely,
Chalmers H. Marquis
CHM/bb
cc; Mr. Kenneth R. Clark
Dr. R k&ard Meyer
